parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Sudden acceleration and brake failure can lead to accidents, injuries, and fatalities, as well as damage to the vehicle and other property.
symptoms: The vehicle accelerates suddenly
the brake pedal becomes hard as a rock
the vehicle fails to slow down or stop
the ABS
Traction Control
and Hill Descent lights (known as the "3 Amigo lights") illuminate
the brake pedal creeps down with pressure being held.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: ABS and Traction Control System Failure
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Failure of the ABS and Traction Control systems can lead to loss of vehicle control, accidents, and injuries, particularly on slick surfaces.
symptoms: The ABS
Traction Control
and Hill Descent lights (known as the "3 Amigo lights") illuminate
the ABS modulator fails
sensors or harness overlays need to be replaced
the traction control and hill descent features do not function.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Brake pedal issues can lead to accidents, injuries, and fatalities, as well as damage to the vehicle and other property.
symptoms: The brake pedal feels low or spongy
the pedal will pump up to a normal feel
the pedal creeps down with pressure being held
the brake warning light does not illuminate.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Failure to disclose a vehicle's lemon status can lead to financial losses for the buyer and a lack of awareness of potential safety issues.
symptoms: The vehicle was previously declared a lemon in another state
the lemon status was not disclosed to the buyer
the vehicle was sold with a clean history report.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Unintended acceleration can cause accidents, injuries, and fatalities, as the vehicle may suddenly speed up without the driver's control.
symptoms: The vehicle accelerates suddenly without the driver's input
the gas pedal gets stuck
the vehicle surges forward unexpectedly
the vehicle accelerates even when the brakes are applied.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Failure of the throttle cable or throttle body can cause unintended acceleration, leading to accidents, injuries, and fatalities.
symptoms: The gas pedal feels stuck
the vehicle surges forward unexpectedly
the gas pedal requires excessive pressure to move
the vehicle accelerates even when the brakes are applied.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Pedal misapplication can cause accidents, injuries, and fatalities, as the driver may unintentionally accelerate the vehicle instead of braking.
symptoms: The brake pedal and accelerator pedal are too close
causing confusion and misapplication
the driver accidentally presses the accelerator pedal instead of the brake pedal.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The sudden failure of the drive shaft can cause loss of vehicle control, leading to accidents, injuries, and damage to the vehicle and surrounding property.
symptoms: The drive shaft detaches from the transmission or vehicle while in motion
resulting in loss of drive
inability to shift into park
and potential loss of vehicle control.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the transmission shift lock system can cause the vehicle to roll away unexpectedly, leading to accidents, injuries, and damage to the vehicle and surrounding property.
symptoms: The vehicle rolls away on its own while in park position
potentially causing accidents
injuries
and damage to the vehicle and surrounding property.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Engine Failure due to Coolant Leak
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: A coolant leak can cause engine failure, leading to overheating, damage to engine components, and potentially leaving the driver stranded.
symptoms: Red fluid leaking
vehicle overheating
temperature gauge rising rapidly
engine failure.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Spark plug wire failure can cause engine misfires, rough idling, and potentially lead to engine damage or failure.
symptoms: Engine running rough
spark plug wires arcing against the valve block
damaged spark plug wires and plugs.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: A transmission fluid leak can cause transmission failure, leading to loss of vehicle control, accidents, or leaving the driver stranded.
symptoms: Transmission fluid leaking
vehicle overheating
temperature gauge rising rapidly.
